# Multimodal data examples of approaches

There are some good examples for the microbiome that care instructuve for other domains.

[Multimedia website](https://krisrs1128.github.io/multimedia/)

```
install.packages("multimedia")
####or you can use the new version:
devtools::install_github("krisrs1128/multimedia")
BiocManager::install("phyloseq")
```
